meta.description:
This is an informational and educational document that states your legal, 
federal, religious exemption based on the authority of state and federal 
laws. It does not guarantee your entrance into any establishment, although 
many people use it for that purpose.

This document can be used to communicate and notify business owners, 
merchants, managers, agents and others of your rights, protected, secured 
and guaranteed by law, including your right to FREE and EQUAL access to any 
business establishment of any kind, whatsoever.

NOTE: This is not designed for you to use or file with your employer. To 
notify your employer of your legal, federal, religious exemption, go here 
for info: https://www.thehealthyamerican.org/religious-exemptions

IMPORTANT INFORMATION:

(1) This document will be automatically available for immediate download 
upon purchase.

(2) Print it out, and fill out the portion with your name and details.

(3) NOTE! DO NOT SIGN THE DOCUMENT UNTIL YOU ARE IN FRONT OF THE NOTARY 
PUBLIC.

(4) Take the document to a Notary Republic and sign it in the Notary’s 
presence.

(5) Place your document in a plastic sleeve protector.

(6) OPTIONAL: Clip the document (in the sleeve protector) on a clipboard 
and carry that with you into places of public accommodation to present to 
anyone who is requiring you to wear a mask or show proof of vaccines.

We have spent hours researching and creating this document and thank you 
for your purchase, as it helps us continue to do this important work of 
creating “tools against tyranny.” We cannot do it without your support.

This version references federal laws and laws in the STATE OF KANSAS. More 
states are being added, so check back soon.

title: LEGAL FEDERAL RELIGIOUS EXEMPTION (KS) — THE HEALTHY AMERICAN.org
cleaned_text:
This is an informational and educational document that states your legal, federal, religious exemption based on the authority of state and federal laws. It does not guarantee your entrance into any establishment, although many people use it for that purpose.

This document can be used to communicate and notify business owners, merchants, managers, agents and others of your rights, protected, secured and guaranteed by law, including your right to FREE and EQUAL access to any business establishment of any kind, whatsoever.

NOTE: This is not designed for you to use or file with your employer. To notify your employer of your legal, federal, religious exemption, go here for info: https://www.thehealthyamerican.org/religious-exemptions

(1) This document will be automatically available for immediate download upon purchase.

(2) Print it out, and fill out the portion with your name and details.

(3) NOTE! DO NOT SIGN THE DOCUMENT UNTIL YOU ARE IN FRONT OF THE NOTARY PUBLIC.

(4) Take the document to a Notary Republic and sign it in the Notary’s presence.

(6) OPTIONAL: Clip the document (in the sleeve protector) on a clipboard and carry that with you into places of public accommodation to present to anyone who is requiring you to wear a mask or show proof of vaccines.

We have spent hours researching and creating this document and thank you for your purchase, as it helps us continue to do this important work of creating “tools against tyranny.” We cannot do it without your support.

This version references federal laws and laws in the STATE OF KANSAS. More states are being added, so check back soon.
